Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    The Game class This class represents the window that has all the graphics for the third room of the Waterworks program.
    Highscores
    The Highscores class This class represents the window that has all the graphics for the high scores page of the game.
    Instructions
    The Instruction class This class represents the window that has all the graphics and mechanics of the instructions Window.It extends the abstract Window class to use its basic mechanics methods for displaying, hiding and clearing the screen.
    Learn
    The Learn class This class represents the Window that has all the graphics and the mechanics for the first room of the Waterworks program.
    LevelSelect
    The LevelSelect class This class represents the LevelSelect window where the user will choose which level they want to play.
    Menu
    The Menu class This class represents the Window that has all the graphics and mechanics for the main menu of the Waterworks program.
    Quiz
    The Quiz class This class represents the Quiz window of the game where the user is tested on what they learned about water conservation.
    SplashScreen
    The Splashscreen class This class represents the window with an animation that plays at the start of the program with the Pistachio Labs logo, and then loads program Resources to avoid lag during runtime.
    StageManager
    The StageManager class This class puts together all the windows of the program, and organises the program flow.
    Window
    The Window class This abstract class is the superclass to which all the independent screens of the program belong.
